Description of incident: "What Happened In late July 2017, HBO became aware of an incident in which an unauthorized third party claimed to haveaccessed HBO’s information technology network. We began investigating the incident as soon as we becameaware of the potential breach. Our investigation has revealed that an unauthorized third party illegally accessedHBO’s network, including some personally identifiable information about you. What Information Was InvolvedThough the investigation is still underway, we have determined that the information involved in this incidentincluded the following types of your personally identifiable information: [Personal Information Categories]."
